MajorClaims.MC1: It is disagreed that computer can affect children in a negative way if they use a computer on a daily basis
MajorClaims.MC2: computer is a boon to children

Claims.C1: computer assists children to use vast resources available over internet to study effectively as well as develop some basic skills which help them in future careers
Claims.C2: computer impacts children on a positive note
Claims.C3: it's clear that computer has a positive effect on the children

Premises.P1: through computer children can access internet to gather knowledge on the subjects they are studying or they are interested about
Premises.P2: The best thing about internet is the availability of information in the form of text, image or video related to almost everything
Premises.P3: students preparing for delivering speech on a certain topic can browse through internet to learn each and every minute details of the subject matter
Premises.P4: It's hard to get everything at a same place unless children are not familiar with computers
Premises.P5: computers enable people to prepare presentations, draw complex graphs and pictures, document thesis in a simple though efficient way
Premises.P6: When children are allowed to play around with computer from a very early age, they get acquainted with the previously mentioned skills and become expert before facing professional world
Premises.P7: students who used to prepare Microsoft PowerPoint presentation for their school projects, get an edge over others at an early stage of their career
